title: Help?
body:
I mostly play ranked games. I had an emergency and was forced to leave a game a few days ago (something I haven't done in a long, long time. Today, I que up and get in a game. I pick Kata and get massive visual bugs and then my game crashes which also crashed windows explorer. After my computer crashes and I get back in the game at minute 10. After about 2 minutes, my computer blue screens it takes another 10 minutes to get into the game and the game crashes again after about a minute. What should I do? This is the first time that my computer has done this (to my knowledge but 4 year history is a while), will I get ban for leaving 2 games in a row? I get being punished for the first one but what can I do about the second one?

Can a rioter please help me or tell me what I can do

replies.body: You won't be banned for leaving a game, but you receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty.  This penalty places you in a lower priority queue where you have to wait to queue up, giving you some extra time to make sure any technical issues that would have caused you to leave is resolved.  The blue screen is a bummer, and may be due to a hardware failure, but there could be other causes as well as such as drivers.  I recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide just in case.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks man, I don't plan on queing up again until I'm sure the problem is fixed. I feel really bad for runing my teams game :( Thanks for responding I'll let you know if I have questions/need help :)
